pages.title: Leech Chest
pages.text: A Leech Chest is a $(l:mutations/leech_chest)mutated$(/l) plant that has been hybridized with a $(item)Chest$(). This plant acts as a $(item)Trapped Chest$() except it cannot join another specimen to form a Double Chest.

pages.title: Blood samples
pages.text: When the Leech chest is opened, a drop of blood from the player will be stored in one of the chests three blood sacs. Blood from the last three players to open the chest will always be stored, although only one sample from each unique player.

pages.title: Retrieving samples
pages.text: If a $(l:constructs/misc/taglock_kit)Taglock Kit$(/l) is used on the Leech Chest when it has stored a blood sample, it will be removed from the chest and inserted into the kit. The plant won't allow a player to remove its own taglock, tho, and will preserve the collected samples if picked up and placed back.
